input.sentences: today is the little boys birthday .
he and friends have gathered to play and celebrate with him .
together they are playing in a pit of colorful balloons .
a family photo is taken with the birthday boy and his cake .
the mom and dad are happy they have made it to another milestone .
output.sentences: Carlos was enjoying his second birthday, there were no clowns this time and all his friends were here.
There was a really cool ballbit where Pablo and Maria were playing, Carlos liked Maria a lot.
Tragedy struck when Miguel stepped on a Lego that had somehow made it into the ball pit, his brother Hank came to the rescue.
All in all it was a great day for the Ramirez Family and the cake at the end was magnificent!
Grandma and Grandpa weren't much for pictures so they left after a few and took a nap but the memories they made would last forever.
